title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' when the file is already open in a different type of editor, nothing happens. The file remains open in its original editor, and the Default Text Editor is not activated.
EB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' when the file is already open in a different type of editor, a new instance of the Default Text Editor should be opened for the selected file.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called 'test.xml'.
3. Open the 'test.xml' file in the scripted resource editor example.
4. In the Navigator, select the 'test.xml' file.
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that a new instance of the Default Text Editor is opened for the 'test.xml' file, regardless of the fact that it is already open in the scripted resource editor example.
